name: hapiest-kue
description: Simple wrapper for Kue that hooks it up with node-config and provides logical separation between job creation and job processing

scripts.test: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:start && docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV=test-docker-local -e NODE_CONFIG_DIR=/app/src/config node /app/node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha /app/src/test/unit --recursive

author: Jonathan Fulton
